article_title: Republicans, Race and Economic Opportunity for All
article_text:
From remarks by Rick Perry, a Republican presidential candidate and former Texas governor, at the National Press Club in Washington, D.C., July 2. A related editorial appears nearby:

We are a country with Hispanic CEOs, with Asian billionaires, and a black president. So why is it that today so many black families feel left behind? Why...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Rick Perry explains how the Republican Party lost the support of black Americans and what it must do to win them back.
twitter.title: Republicans, Race and Economic Opportunity for All

article_summary:
From remarks by Rick Perry, a Republican presidential candidate and former Texas governor, at the National Press Club in Washington, D.C., July 2.
A related editorial appears nearby:We are a country with Hispanic CEOs, with Asian billionaires, and a black president.
So why is it that today so many black families feel left behind?
